Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.8.1 Windows 64bit

Problem:  I have been having tons of problems with crashes in my KSP 1.8.1 Realism Overhaul save. I suspected that RSSVE was causing the issue, as removing it would stop the crashes. But after doing a fresh install of RO, KSP was running fine with RSSVE installed. Just recently I realized that I had forgot to install Testlite, so I installed it and low and behold the crashes are back.

Mods Installed:

  •  Advanced Jet Engine (AdvancedJetEngine v2.15.0)
  • AtmosphereAutopilot (Fly-By-Wire) (AtmosphereAutopilot v1.5.16)
  • B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 1:v0.93)
  • B9 Part Switch (B9PartSwitch v2.14.0)
  • BahamutoD Animation Modules (BDAnimationModules 1:v0.6.5.8)
  • ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 1:0.1.10.14)
  • Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 1.4.1.0)
  • Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator 1.30.5)
  • Custom Barn Kit (CustomBarnKit 1.1.21.0)
  • Deadly Reentry Continued (DeadlyReentry v7.8.0)
  • DMagic Orbital Science (DMagicOrbitalScience 1.4.3)
  • DMModuleScienceAnimateGeneric (DMagicScienceAnimate v0.23)
  • Editor Extensions Redux (EditorExtensionsRedux 3.4.1.1)
  • Environmental Visual Enhancements (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 2:EVE-1.8.0-2)
  • Ferram Aerospace Research Continued (FerramAerospaceResearchContinued 3:0.16.0.0)
  • Firespitter Core (FirespitterCore v7.15)
  • Firespitter Resources config (FirespitterResourcesConfig v7.15)
  • Hangar Extender (HangerExtenderExtended 3.6.0)
  • Kerbal Alarm Clock (KerbalAlarmClock v3.12.0.0)
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.7.2)
  • Kerbal Joint Reinforcement Continued (KerbalJointReinforcementContinued v3.5.1)
  • Kerbal Renamer (KerbalRenamer v1.4.0)
  • Kerbalism (Kerbalism 3.11)
  • Kerbalism - RealismOverhaul Config (Kerbalism-Config-RO v1.0)
  • Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier (Kopernicus 2:release-1.8.1-1)
  • KRASH - Kerbal Ramification Artifical Simulation Hub (simulation mod for KSP) (KRASH 0.5.33.2)
  • KSC Switcher (KSCSwitcher v1.8.0.0)
  • KSP Wheel (KSPWheel 1:0.16.14.33)
  • MagiCore (MagiCore 1.3.2.3)
  • MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.9.2.0)
  • ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.2.7.0)
  • Module Manager (ModuleManager 4.1.4)
  • Near Future Construction (NearFutureConstruction 1.2.3)
  • Near Future Propulsion (NearFuturePropulsion 1.2.2)
  • Near Future Solar (NearFutureSolar 1.2.3)
  • Near Future Solar Core (NearFutureSolar-Core 1.2.3)
  • Patch Manager (PatchManager 0.0.17.2)
  • Pood's Milky Way Skybox (PoodsMilkyWaySkybox v.1.3.0)
  • Precise Maneuver (PreciseManeuver 2:2.4.4)
  • Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings 1:v1.8.3)
  • Procedural Parts (ProceduralParts v2.1.2)
  • RCS Build Aid Continued (RCSBuildAidCont 1:0.10.0)
  • Real Antennas (RealAntennas v1.2.1)
  • Real Fuels (RealFuels rf-v12.8.4.1)
  • Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v13.3.2)
  • Real Solar System (RealSolarSystem v18.1.3)
  • Real Solar System Textures - 8192 x 4096 (RSSTextures8192 v18.3)
  • RealChute Parachute Systems (RealChute v1.4.8)
  • RealHeat (RealHeat v5.1)
  • Realism Overhaul (RealismOverhaul v12.8.1)
  • Realistic Progression One (RP-1) (RP-0 v1.7)
  • ReStock (ReStock 1.1.2)
  • Retractable Lifting Surface Module (RetractableLiftingSurface 0.2.1.1)
  • RO Capsules (ROCapsules v1.2)
  • RO Engines (ROEngines v1.6)
  • RO Library (ROLib v1.1)
  • RO Solar (ROSolar v1.1.1)
  • RO Tanks (ROTanks v2.2.1)
  • RSS DateTime Formatter (RSSDateTimeFormatter 1.6.1.0)
  • scatterer (Scatterer 3:v0.055)
  • Scatterer Default Config (Scatterer-config 3:v0.055)
  • Scatterer Sunflare (Scatterer-sunflare 3:v0.055)
  • SmokeScreen - Extended FX Plugin (SmokeScreen 2.8.14.0)
  • Solver Engines plugin (SolverEngines v3.7.5)
  • SXTContinued (SXTContinued 2:0.3.29.5)
  • Test Lite (TestLite 0.3.0)
  • TextureReplacer (TextureReplacer v4.1.1)
  • Textures Unlimited (TexturesUnlimited 1.5.9.24)
  • Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.9.4)
  • Trajectories (Trajectories v2.3.4)
  • Ven's New Parts (VenStockRevamp-NewParts v1.14.2)
  • Ven's Stock Part Revamp Core (VenStockRevamp-Core v1.14.2)
  • Zero MiniAVC (ZeroMiniAVC 1:1.1.0.1

Reproduction Steps: The crashes usually happen when launching a rocket while passing through the cloud layer (exiting atmosphere, or re-entering). But I have experienced crashes in many other situations as well (in the VAB, on the launch pad, in the R&D building, just to name a few).

Log: I apologize because I'm not the most gifted person when it comes to solving computer issues, so if these are not the right crash logs you will have to excuse me.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4pclq9odm8d31sb/Player.log?dl=0 player.log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gxtc0kplse1o2y0/error.log?dl=0 error.log

The logs say you have an ‘attempt to access invalid address’ error.
This error is sometimes caused by antivirus software blocking access to something the game needs, so try changing your antivirus settings to let KSP do its thing unhindered. It may also be caused by running out of RAM.

 

EDIT: Ironically enough, I just had the same crash happen to me, but in KSP 1.10.1 and a very different set of mods.

Edited November 12, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie

3 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

The logs say you have an ‘attempt to access invalid address’ error.
This error is sometimes caused by antivirus software blocking access to something the game needs, so try changing your antivirus settings to let KSP do its thing unhindered. It may also be caused by running out of RAM.

Oh wow, thank you that's really helpful. I just got a new PC, so it's possible that I still have some remnants of McAfee still hanging around. I'll check windows defender as well.

If this fixes it, you will have helped me solve a month old headache, thanks.

Edit: In Windows Defender I found a setting which randomizes the location of VRAM. I'm going to try turning it off, because I was thinking that KSP might be having problems locating the VRAM (since my physical memory usage is actually pretty low). (I don't know much about computers so I might be thinking completely wrong here...)

Edited November 12, 2020 by Hawkeye91803
